event.title: Open Source Spotlight
event.metaTitle: Open Source Spotlight at WeAreDevelopers World Congress
event.metaDesc: Showcase your open source projects at the Open Source Spotlight in Berlin this July. Selected participants will get free tickets for the event and a space to showcase your project to 15,000+ developers and tech leaders from across the world.
event.content: Showcase your open source projects at the Open Source Spotlight in Berlin this July. Selected participants will get free tickets for the event and a space to showcase your project to 15,000+ developers and tech leaders from across the world.
